endings_ed_ing.meaning_en: the act of moving air with a fan or waving something to create a breeze
endings_ed_ing.example_en: She was fanning herself with a magazine to stay cool.
endings_ed_ing.example_vi: Cô ấy quạt mình bằng một tờ tạp chí để giữ mát.

endings_ed_ing.meaning_en: past tense of rake; to gather or smooth with a rake
endings_ed_ing.example_en: He raked the leaves into a pile.
endings_ed_ing.example_vi: Anh ấy cào lá thành một đống.

endings_ed_ing.meaning_en: past tense of rip; to tear or be torn violently
endings_ed_ing.example_en: She ripped the paper in frustration.
endings_ed_ing.example_vi: Cô ấy xé tờ giấy trong sự bực bội.

endings_ed_ing.meaning_en: the act of recording or attaching with adhesive tape
endings_ed_ing.example_en: They were taping the interview for the podcast.
endings_ed_ing.example_vi: Họ đang ghi âm cuộc phỏng vấn cho podcast.

endings_ed_ing.meaning_en: the act of moving through water by using limbs
endings_ed_ing.example_en: Swimming in the lake is refreshing.
endings_ed_ing.example_vi: Bơi lội trong hồ rất sảng khoái.

endings_ed_ing.meaning_en: the act of walking through water or other liquid
endings_ed_ing.example_en: The children were wading in the shallow stream.
endings_ed_ing.example_vi: Bọn trẻ đang lội nước ở con suối nông.
